```{r}
data <- datasets::USArrests
data$States <- rownames(tztuidzdata)
str(data)
library(ggplot2)
data$Assault <- as.numeric(data$Assault)
data$UrbanPop <- as.numeric(data$UrbanPop)
tidyr::gather(data, Murder, Assault, Rape, key = Offense, value = Count)
values = c(Assault = "red", Murder = "blue", Rape = "yellow")
g <- ggplot(
  data = data,
  mapping = aes(x = Murder, Assault, Rape, y = UrbanPop, color = Murder)
)
``` {r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
g <- g + geom_col()
g

```
